item.title: Release 1.16.8
item.description:
Version 1.16.8 of Remembrances-MCP is now available! This update brings important new features and improvements since version 1.14.1.

Why update? Benefits for you

  • Get the most from your hardware: Remembrances-MCP now leverages the power of AMD Ryzen processors and CUDA graphics cards, delivering superior performance and faster responses.
  • Easier installation and updates: New scripts and processes make setup and upgrades easier than ever, even on Mac and Docker environments.
  • More compatibility and flexibility: The system works with both embedded and external databases, adapting to your needs and environment.
  • More useful and personalized responses: When information is missing, the system now suggests alternatives and presents results in clearer, more user-friendly formats (YAML and “toon”), making decision-making easier.
  • All-in-one package: New versions include all necessary libraries, simplifying installation and reducing compatibility issues.

item.title: Release 1.14.1
item.description:
Version 1.14.1 of Remembrances-MCP is now available! This update brings new features, improvements, and important fixes since version 1.11.0.

Why update? Benefits for you

  • Smart automation: The system now detects and updates your code changes automatically. Forget manual tasks and enjoy peace of mind knowing everything is always in sync.
  • More stability and clarity: The “internal engine” has been reorganized to make the platform more robust and easier to maintain. This means fewer errors and a smoother experience for you.
  • Better traceability: Internal logs are now clearer, making it easier to detect and fix any issues. This results in a more reliable and transparent service.
  • Key bug fixes: Issues that could affect project indexing and tracking have been resolved, ensuring your information is always accessible and up to date.

item.title: Release 1.11.0: Events Tracking & Specialized Code Embeddings
item.description:
We’re pleased to announce Remembrances MCP 1.11.0, bringing two powerful new capabilities: a comprehensive Events & Logs system for temporal tracking and Dual Code Embeddings for optimized code search.

ðŸ“… Events & Logs System

Track activities, conversations, logs, and milestones with the new Events system. Unlike regular memories, events are designed for time-ordered data with powerful temporal queries.

What Makes Events Special?

Hybrid Search: Events combine vector similarity with BM25 text search. Search by meaning (“authentication issues”) and get results ranked by both semantic relevance and keyword matching.
